---
id: service-a
version: 1.0.0
sends:
  - id: event-a
    version: 1.0.0
  - id: command-b
    version: 1.0.0
  - id: command-c
    version: 1.0.0
  - id: command-d
    version: 1.0.0
  - id: query-b
    version: 1.0.0
  - id: query-c
    version: 1.0.0
  - id: query-d
    version: 1.0.0
receives:
  - id: command-a
    version: 1.0.0
  - id: query-a
    version: 1.0.0
---

# Overview

Service A belongs to [DomainA v2.0](../../domains/domain-a/index.md) and [DomainA v1.0](../../domains/domain-a/versioned/1.0.0/index.md)
